TopicTitle: Having trouble with KIS on Minmus

Articles.Content:
When I land on Minmus I can right-click on the MK1 Command Pod and see the correct inventory for the scientist(wrench) and the engineer(powerdrill). I then EVA the engineer and right-click on him -- he does not show an inventory button in the popup during EVA. I put him back in the command and can see his inventory. Thoughts?

More data:

[LOG 21:34:53.376] ******* Log Initiated for Kerbal Space Program - 1.4.2.2110 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us *******
Kerbal Space Program - 1.4.2.2110 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us
